description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "URGENT EVASION 360" is a multi directional shooting game. The player must fly a helicopter and battle various land and air-based enemies. Copyright 2011 MUKAGOSOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
